page.title: 14My own room by Tom Sherratt
page.content: My room is about four metres by two metres.The{snooker table}takes up about a quarter of the room which leaves the rest for:-{two wardrobes, {one bunkbed, two desks, two {bookshelves}and my brother's{Action {Men}stuff that goes under the snooker table. The first{wardrobe}is in the corner as you come in,whilst the other is opposite you. One of the{desks}is in front of you.The{snooker table}is in the middle of the room. The{bunkbed}is on your left as you come through the door with one{ {bookshelf}behind the door and one in the corner on the left. At the other end of the room are two sets of windows with wooden frames.
